about_the_game:
Get ready for heroic warfare

Put on a pair of dry standard issue socks and jump into the fight in Heroes of Valor. A cozy cartoony arcade class shooter with grand scale battles and vehicles, set in a stylized adaptation of World War 2. Fight as the Axis or Allied forces and play as a commando, soldier, gunner or engineer. Fly a warplane, drive a tank or fight on foot in many different locations such as the beaches of Normandy, the arctic, the scorching desert, villages, ports and mountains.

Take to the skies in epic dogfights

Show your enemies the meaning of fear as you rain down bombs and gunfire from the sky. Get on the tail of enemy fighter planes and see how long they can outrun you.

Rev up your engine

Become a tank commander and navigate your metal beast through treacherous roads and fields.

Be a hero

Choose from a wide range of weapons and powerful abilities that help you conquer the battlefield. Fight with submachineguns, assault rifles, semi-automatic rifles, bolt action rifles, pistols, shotguns, RPGs, explosives, knives and much more!

Build your hero by choosing a class and combining weapons and abilities. There are many different ways to play. Lure enemies into your traps as a commando, support your allies as a soldier, mow everything down as a gunner or build defensive structures as an engineer.

Features

  • Singleplayer, co-op and pvp

  • Casual battlefield action

  • Immersive chaos

  • Fight like a super soldier using hero abilities and a wide range of weapons

  • Drive tanks, motorcycles and fly planes

  • Unlockable cosmetics: outfits, face items, hats, weapon/vehicle skins and emotes

  • Many different gamemodes including conquest, CTF, king of the hill, frontline push, bombing run and more

  • Diverse battle locations such as deserts, arctic regions, mountains, villages and even a moving a train

  • Bots that fly planes, drive tanks and that fight in a smart way and change their strategy based on dynamic factors

  • Customize your battles to your liking (bot difficulty, bot amount, match length, map rotation, time of day, gamemode and more)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6GHz or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 700 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 3.3GHz or similar
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Heroes of Valor is a casual arcade class shooter with grand scale battles, vehicles and over the top abilities, set in a stylized adaptation of World War 2. Join the Axis or Allied forces and fight as an infantry hero, a pilot or a tank commander on many different battlefields!
